```{r }
options(repos = c(CRAN = "https://cran.r-project.org"))
install.packages("readxl")
install.packages("writexl")
library(readxl)
library(writexl)
data <- read_excel("Book1-1.xlsx")
head(data)
head(data, n=10)
str(data)
summary(data)
write.csv(data, "cleaned_soil_data.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
